<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4350</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">IT Task</string>
            <string language="es">Tarea de Tecnología de la Información</string>
            <string language="ga">Tasc TF</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ES Aufgabe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">IL Chargent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ELE Tarefa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ESSO Operazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχειώδης εργασία ΤΠ</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Information Technology is one of the subjects that may be chosen as a Vocational Specialism in year 2. This is a summary sheet of the guidelines for a task and a list of suggested tasks.</string>
            <string language="es">La tecnología de la información es una de las materias que ha sido elegida como especialidad vocacional en el año 2. Esta es una hoja resumen de las directrices para una tarea y una lista de tareas sugeridas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Ta an Teicneolaíocht Faisnéise ar cheann de na hábhair ar féidir a roghnú mar Speisialachas Gairme sa dara bliain.  Seo bileog achoimre de na treoracha do thasc agus liosta do thascanna molta.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">LCA</string>
            <string language="es">LCA</string>
            <string language="ga">ATF</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="es">Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationstechnologie ist eins der Themen, die 
als berufliches Spezialistentum in Jahr 2 gewählt werden können. 
Dieses ist ein zusammenfassendes Blatt der Korrekturlinien für 
eine Aufgabe und eine Liste der vorgeschlagenen Aufgaben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La technologie de l'information est l'un des 
sujets qui peuvent être choisis comme spécialisme professionnel en 
année 2. C'est une feuille récapitulative des directives pour 
un charger et une liste de suggéré charge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A tecnologia de informação é um dos assuntos 
que podem ser escolhidos como um specialism vocacional no ano 2. 
Esta é uma folha sumária dos guidelines para uma tarefa e uma 
lista de tarefas sugeridas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La tecnologia dell'informazione è uno degli 
oggetti che possono essere scelti come specializzazione professionale 
durante l'anno 2. Ciò è un foglio sommario della guida di 
riferimento per un'operazione e una lista delle mansioni suggerite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τεχνολογία πληροφοριών είναι ένα από τα θέματα που
μπορούν να επιλεχτούν ως επαγγελματική ειδικότητα στο έτος 2. 
Αυτό είναι ένα συνοπτικό φύλλο των οδηγιών για μια 
στοιχειώδη εργασία και ένας κατάλογος προτεινόμενων στοιχειωδών 
εργασιών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.
